name: bows
description: Rainbowed console logs for chrome, opera and firefox in development.

scripts.pre-version: git checkout master && git pull && npm ls
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish

author: Philip Roberts
